verses.verse: וַיָּ֣מָת <WH4191> vai-Ya-mot died שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <WH8050> she-mu-'El, And Samuel וַיִּקָּבְצ֤וּ <WH6908> vai-yik-ka-ve-Tzu were gathered together כָל־ <WH3605> chol and all יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El and all the Israelites וַיִּסְפְּדוּ־ <WH5594> vai-yis-pe-du- and lamented ל֔וֹ lo, וַיִּקְבְּרֻ֥הוּ <WH6912> vai-yik-be-Ru-hu him and buried בְּבֵית֖וֹ <WH1004> be-vei-To him in his house בָּרָמָ֑ה <WH7414> ba-ra-Mah; at Ramah וַיָּ֣קָם <WH6965> vai-Ya-kom arose דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> da-Vid, And David וַיֵּ֖רֶד <WH3381> vai-Ye-red and went down אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מִדְבַּ֥ר <WH4057> mid-Bar to the wilderness פָּארָֽן׃ <WH6290> pa-Ran. of Paran ס sa-Mek

וְאִ֨ישׁ <WH376> ve-'Ish And [there was] a man בְּמָע֜וֹן <WH4584> be-ma-'on in Maon וּמַעֲשֵׂ֣הוּ <WH4639> u-ma-'a-Se-hu whose possessions בַכַּרְמֶ֗ל <WH3760> vak-kar-Mel, [were] in Carmel וְהָאִישׁ֙ <WH376> ve-ha-'Ish and the man גָּד֣וֹל <WH1419> ga-Dol great מְאֹ֔ד <WH3966> me-'Od, [was] very וְל֛וֹ ve-Lo צֹ֥אן <WH6629> tzon sheep שְׁלֹֽשֶׁת־ <WH7969> she-lo-shet- and he had three אֲלָפִ֖ים <WH505> 'a-la-Fim thousand וְאֶ֣לֶף <WH505> ve-'E-lef and a thousand עִזִּ֑ים <WH5795> 'iz-Zim; goats וַיְהִ֛י <WH1961> vay-Hi came בִּגְזֹ֥ז <WH1494> big-Zoz and he was shearing אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- צֹאנ֖וֹ <WH6629> tzo-No his sheep בַּכַּרְמֶֽל׃ <WH3760> bak-kar-Mel. in Carmel

וְשֵׁ֤ם <WH8034> ve-Shem Now the name הָאִישׁ֙ <WH376> ha-'Ish of the man נָבָ֔ל <WH5037> na-Val, [was] Nabal וְשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> ve-Shem and the name אִשְׁתּ֖וֹ <WH802> ish-To of his wife אֲבִגָ֑יִל <WH26> 'a-vi-Ga-yil; Abigail וְהָאִשָּׁ֤ה <WH802> ve-ha-'ish-Shah and [she was] a woman טֽוֹבַת־ <WH2896> toat- of good שֶׂ֙כֶל֙ <WH7922> se-chel understanding וִ֣יפַת <WH3303> Vi-fat and of a beautiful תֹּ֔אַר <WH8389> To-'ar, countenance וְהָאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> ve-ha-'Ish but the man קָשֶׁ֛ה <WH7186> ka-Sheh [was] churlish וְרַ֥ע <WH7451> ve-Ra' and evil מַעֲלָלִ֖ים <WH4611> ma-'a-la-Lim in his doings וְה֥וּא <WH1931> ve-Hu he; כָלֶבֹו chal-vov ככָלִבִּֽי׃ <WH3820> cha-lib-Bi. care for ק

וַיִּשְׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> vai-yish-Ma' heard דָּוִ֖ד <WH1732> da-Vid And David בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> bam-mid-Bar; in the wilderness כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for גֹזֵ֥ז <WH1494> go-Zez did shear נָבָ֖ל <WH5037> na-Val that Nabal אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- צֹאנֽוֹ׃ <WH6629> tzo-No. his sheep

וַיִּשְׁלַ֥ח <WH7971> vai-yish-Lach sent out דָּוִ֖ד <WH1732> da-Vid And David עֲשָׂרָ֣ה <WH6235> 'a-sa-Rah ten נְעָרִ֑ים <WH5288> ne-'a-Rim; young men וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said דָּוִ֜ד <WH1732> da-Vid and David לַנְּעָרִ֗ים <WH5288> lan-ne-'a-Rim, unto the young men עֲל֤וּ <WH5927> 'a-Lu Get you up כַרְמֶ֙לָה֙ <WH3760> char-Me-lah to Carmel וּבָאתֶ֣ם <WH935> u-va-Tem and go אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about נָבָ֔ל <WH5037> na-Val, to Nabal וּשְׁאֶלְתֶּם־ <WH7592> u-she-'el-tem- ask counsel ל֥וֹ lo בִשְׁמִ֖י <WH8034> vish-Mi him in my name לְשָׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH7965> le-sha-Lom. favor

וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֥ם <WH559> va-'a-mar-Tem And thus shall ye say כֹּ֖ה <WH3541> koh and thus לֶחָ֑י <WH2416> le-Chai; to him that liveth וְאַתָּ֤ה <WH859> ve-'at-Tah you שָׁלוֹם֙ <WH7965> sha-lOm [in prosperity] Peace וּבֵיתְךָ֣ <WH1004> u-vei-te-Cha [be] to thine house שָׁל֔וֹם <WH7965> sha-Lom, [be] both to thee and peace וְכֹ֥ל <WH3605> ve-Chol all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- after לְךָ֖ le-Cha שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH7965> sha-Lom. and peace

וְעַתָּ֣ה <WH6258> ve-'at-Tah Now שָׁמַ֔עְתִּי <WH8085> sha-Ma'-ti, And now I have heard כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki that גֹזְזִ֖ים <WH1494> go-ze-Zim that thou hast shearers לָ֑ךְ Lach; עַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> 'at-Tah, now הָרֹעִ֤ים <WH7462> ha-ro-'Im now thy shepherds אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- after לְךָ֙ le-Cha הָי֣וּ <WH1961> ha-Yu have been עִמָּ֔נוּ <WH5973> 'im-Ma-nu, them לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo nor הֶכְלַמְנ֗וּם <WH3637> hech-lam-Num, which were with us we hurt וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- nor נִפְקַ֤ד <WH6485> nif-Kad missing לָהֶם֙ la-Hem מְא֔וּמָה <WH3972> me-'U-mah, them not neither was there ought כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all יְמֵ֖י <WH3117> ye-Mei unto them all the while הֱיוֹתָ֥ם <WH1961> he-yo-Tam have been בַּכַּרְמֶֽל׃ <WH3760> bak-kar-Mel. they were in Carmel

שְׁאַ֨ל <WH7592> she-'Al Ask אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- נְעָרֶ֜יךָ <WH5288> ne-'a-Rei-cha thy young men וְיַגִּ֣ידוּ <WH5046> ve-yag-Gi-du and they will shew לָ֗ךְ Lach, וְיִמְצְא֨וּ <WH4672> ve-yim-tze-'U find הַנְּעָרִ֥ים <WH5288> han-ne-'a-Rim thee Wherefore let the young men חֵן֙ <WH2580> chen favour בְּעֵינֶ֔יךָ <WH5869> be-'ei-Nei-cha, in thine eyes כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and י֥וֹם <WH3117> Yom day ט֖וֹב <WH2896> Tov in a good בָּ֑נוּ <WH935> Ba-nu; for we come תְּנָה־ <WH5414> te-nah- give נָּ֗א <WH4994> Na, Please אֵת֩ <WH853> 'et אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher whatever תִּמְצָ֤א <WH4672> tim-Tza I pray thee whatsoever cometh יָֽדְךָ֙ <WH3027> ya-de-Cha to thine hand לַעֲבָדֶ֔יךָ <WH5650> la-'a-va-Dei-cha, unto thy servants וּלְבִנְךָ֖ <WH1121> u-le-vin-Cha and to thy son לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> le-da-Vid. David

וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> vai-ya-Vo-'u came נַעֲרֵ֣י <WH5288> na-'a-Rei young men דָוִ֔ד <WH1732> da-Vid, And when David's וַיְדַבְּר֧וּ <WH1696> vay-dab-be-Ru they spake אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to נָבָ֛ל <WH5037> na-Val to Nabal כְּכָל־ <WH3605> ke-chol- to all הַדְּבָרִ֥ים <WH1697> had-de-va-Rim according to all those words הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> ha-'El-leh these בְּשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> be-Shem in the name דָּוִ֑ד <WH1732> da-Vid; of David וַיָּנֽוּחוּ׃ <WH5117> vai-ya-Nu-chu. and ceased

וַיַּ֨עַן <WH6030> vai-Ya-'an answered נָבָ֜ל <WH5037> na-Val And Nabal אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עַבְדֵ֤י <WH5650> 'av-Dei servants דָוִד֙ <WH1732> da-Vid David's וַיֹּ֔אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer, and said מִ֥י <WH4310> mi Who דָוִ֖ד <WH1732> da-Vid David's וּמִ֣י <WH4310> u-Mi Who בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- is the son יִשָׁ֑י <WH3448> yi-Shai; Jesse הַיּוֹם֙ <WH3117> hai-yOm now a days רַבּ֣וּ <WH7235> rab-Bu abundance עֲבָדִ֔ים <WH5650> 'a-va-Dim, servants הַמִּתְפָּ֣רְצִ֔ים <WH6555> ham-mit-Pa-re-Tzim, that break away אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> 'ish every man מִפְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> mip-pe-Nei from אֲדֹנָֽיו׃ <WH113> 'a-do-Nav. his master

וְלָקַחְתִּ֤י <WH3947> ve-la-kach-Ti Shall I then take אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- לַחְמִי֙ <WH3899> lach-Mi my bread וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et מֵימַ֔י <WH4325> mei-Mai, and my water וְאֵת֙ <WH853> ve-'Et טִבְחָתִ֔י <WH2878> tiv-cha-Ti, and my flesh אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher whose טָבַ֖חְתִּי <WH2873> ta-Vach-ti that I have killed לְגֹֽזְזָ֑י <WH1494> le-go-ze-Zai; for my shearers וְנָֽתַתִּי֙ <WH5414> ve-na-tat-Ti and give לַֽאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH376> la-'a-na-Shim, to men אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> 'a-Sher whose לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo not יָדַ֔עְתִּי <WH3045> ya-Da'-ti, whom I know אֵ֥י <WH335> 'ei how מִזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> miz-Zeh he הֵֽמָּה׃ <WH1992> Hem-mah. like

וַיַּהַפְכ֥וּ <WH2015> vai-ya-haf-Chu turned נַעֲרֵֽי־ <WH5288> na-'a-rei- young men דָוִ֖ד <WH1732> da-Vid So David's לְדַרְכָּ֑ם <WH1870> le-dar-Kam; their way וַיָּשֻׁ֙בוּ֙ <WH7725> vai-ya-Shu-vu and went again וַיָּבֹ֔אוּ <WH935> vai-ya-Vo-'u, and came וַיַּגִּ֣דוּ <WH5046> vai-yag-Gi-du and told ל֔וֹ lo, כְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> ke-Chol to all הַדְּבָרִ֥ים <WH1697> had-de-va-Rim him all those sayings הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> ha-'El-leh. these

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> vai-yo-Mer said דָּוִ֨ד <WH1732> da-Vid And David לַאֲנָשָׁ֜יו <WH376> la-'a-na-Shav every man חִגְר֣וּ׀ <WH2296> chig-Ru Gird ye on אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> 'ish every man אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- חַרְבּ֗וֹ <WH2719> char-Bo, his sword וַֽיַּחְגְּרוּ֙ <WH2296> vai-yach-ge-Ru And they girded on אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> 'ish men אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- חַרְבּ֔וֹ <WH2719> char-Bo, his sword וַיַּחְגֹּ֥ר <WH2296> vai-yach-Gor also girded on גַּם־ <WH1571> gam- also דָּוִ֖ד <WH1732> da-Vid and David אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- חַרְבּ֑וֹ <WH2719> char-Bo; his sword וַֽיַּעֲל֣וּ׀ <WH5927> vai-ya-'a-Lu and there went up אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei after דָוִ֗ד <WH1732> da-Vid, David כְּאַרְבַּ֤ע <WH702> ke-'ar-Ba' about four מֵאוֹת֙ <WH3967> me-'Ot hundred אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> 'Ish, man וּמָאתַ֖יִם <WH3967> u-ma-Ta-yim and two hundred יָשְׁב֥וּ <WH3427> ya-she-Vu abode עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- with הַכֵּלִֽים׃ <WH3627> hak-ke-Lim. by the stuff

וְהָ֣אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH582> ve-Ha-'a-na-Shim, But the men טֹבִ֥ים <WH2896> to-Vim good לָ֖נוּ La-nu מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> me-'Od; [were] very וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> ve-Lo nor הָכְלַ֙מְנוּ֙ <WH3637> ha-che-Lam-nu unto us and we were not hurt וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- nor פָקַ֣דְנוּ <WH6485> fa-Kad-nu neither missed מְא֔וּמָה <WH3972> me-'U-mah, we any thing כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- long יְמֵי֙ <WH3117> ye-Mei as long as הִתְהַלַּ֣כְנוּ <WH1980> hit-hal-Lach-nu we were conversant אִתָּ֔ם <WH854> 'it-Tam, for בִּֽהְיוֹתֵ֖נוּ <WH1961> bih-yo-Te-nu were in בַּשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <WH7704> bas-sa-Deh. with them when we were in the fields

חוֹמָה֙ <WH2346> cho-Mah They were a wall הָי֣וּ <WH1961> ha-Yu become עָלֵ֔ינוּ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-nu, unto גַּם־ <WH1571> gam- both לַ֖יְלָה <WH3915> Lay-lah unto us both by night גַּם־ <WH1571> gam- both יוֹמָ֑ם <WH3119> yo-Mam; and day כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all יְמֵ֛י <WH3117> ye-Mei all the while הֱיוֹתֵ֥נוּ <WH1961> he-yo-Te-nu become עִמָּ֖ם <WH5973> 'im-Mam them רֹעִ֥ים <WH7462> ro-'Im we were with them keeping הַצֹּֽאן׃ <WH6629> hatz-Tzon. the sheep

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> ve-'at-Tah, Now דְּעִ֤י <WH3045> de-'I Now therefore know וּרְאִי֙ <WH7200> u-re-'I and consider מַֽה־ <WH4100> mah- what תַּעֲשִׂ֔י <WH6213> ta-'a-Si, what thou wilt do כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for כָלְתָ֧ה <WH3615> chal-Tah is determined הָרָעָ֛ה <WH7451> ha-ra-'Ah for evil אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- against אֲדֹנֵ֖ינוּ <WH113> 'a-do-Nei-nu against our master וְעַ֣ל <WH5921> ve-'Al and against כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all בֵּית֑וֹ <WH1004> bei-To; and against all his household וְהוּא֙ <WH1931> ve-Hu he בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- for he [is such] a son בְּלִיַּ֔עַל <WH1100> be-li-Ya-'al, of Belial מִדַּבֵּ֖ר <WH1696> mid-dab-Ber that [a man] cannot speak אֵלָֽיו׃ <WH413> 'e-Lav. against

וַתְּמַהֵ֣ר <WH4116> vat-te-ma-Her made haste; אֲבֹוגַיִל 'a-vo-ga-yil כאֲבִיגַ֡יִל <WH26> 'a-vi-Ga-yil Abigal קוַתִּקַּח֩ <WH3947> vat-tik-Kach and took מָאתַ֨יִם <WH3967> ma-Ta-yim two hundred לֶ֜חֶם <WH3899> Le-chem loaves וּשְׁנַ֣יִם <WH8147> u-she-Na-yim and two נִבְלֵי־ <WH5035> niv-lei- bottles יַ֗יִן <WH3196> Ya-yin, of wine וְחָמֵ֨שׁ <WH2568> ve-cha-Mesh and five צֹ֤אן <WH6629> tzon sheep; עֲשָׂוֹות 'a-sa-Vot כעֲשׂוּיֹת֙ <WH6213> 'a-su-Yot accomplish קוְחָמֵ֤שׁ <WH2568> ve-cha-Mesh and five סְאִים֙ <WH5429> se-'Im measures קָלִ֔י <WH7039> ka-Li, of parched וּמֵאָ֥ה <WH3967> u-me-'Ah [corn] and an hundred צִמֻּקִ֖ים <WH6778> tzim-mu-Kim clusters of raisins וּמָאתַ֣יִם <WH3967> u-ma-Ta-yim and two hundred דְּבֵלִ֑ים <WH1690> de-ve-Lim; cakes וַתָּ֖שֶׂם <WH7760> vat-Ta-sem of figs and laid עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on הַחֲמֹרִֽים׃ <WH2543> ha-cha-mo-Rim.
